body.name: Ban Shower Fresh 24-hour Invisible Antiperspirant, Solid Deodorant for Women and Men, Underarm Wetness Protection, with Odor-fighting Ingredients, 2.6 Ounce (Pack of 4)
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.

features: ANTIPERSPIRANT AND ANTIBACTERIAL - With odor-fighting ingredients and Kihada extract, Ban Deodorant targets and helps reduce odor.
ALL DAY DEODORANT - Provides 24-hour underarm odor and wetness protection.
HELPS STOP ODOR WITHOUT COVERING UP - This antiperspirant deodorant helps to reduce odor from perspiration by breaking down sweat on the skin’s surface, instead of covering up with heavy fragrances.
AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SCENTS - Original Unscented, Powder Fresh, Shower Fresh, and Sweet Simplicity.
FOR NEARLY SEVEN DECADES - Ban has been providing America with simple yet effective solutions for staying fresh all day.
body.description: Ensure you'll stay protected from underarm odor and wetness for 24 hours by starting your morning with Ban Invisible Solid Antiperspirant. With odor-fighting ingredients and Kihada extract, the formula helps eliminate odor caused by bacteria breaking down sweat on your skin’s surface, and it helps to significantly reduce perspiration, so you'll feel fresher and dryer for longer. Ban Invisible Solid Antiperspirant in Shower Fresh features the classic clean, fresh scent of baby powder, but won't compete with your perfume or other scented products you may use. For nearly seven decades, Ban has been providing America with simple yet effective solutions for staying fresh all day. Our antiperspirants, available in a variety of scents, offer 24-hour protection from odor and wetness. Ban invented the first applicator based deodorant in 1954, the iconic roll-on, and has been a trusted name in underarm protection ever since. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deodorant that I’ve used!
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try this deodorant out on a whim, looking for something different that I might prefer over the usual drugstore options out there. I was pleasantly surprised at how well this one worked! The effects last well over 24 hours for me, and I don’t find myself having to reapply before my next shower. The scent itself is pleasant, not overpowering at all. The application is extremely smooth. It feels almost like a gel when it goes on, and it doesn’t drag or tug at the skin when you’re putting it on. On top of that, I haven’t noticed any residue on my clothes after using it! This has been the best deodorant I’ve ever used, and I’ll probably continue using it forever unless it gets discontinued.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low price but perfect deodorant and keeping all day.
reviews.reviewText: This item is less than $3 or $4 a piece, but quality is excellent. Perfect deodorant and keeping all day long. I like unscented. This is what I want for long days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: wanted to purchase a new deodorant and this was a great pick! It smells amazing and feels great. Goes on smoothly and having this pack is totally worth the $$ (^:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Powder fresh scent!
reviews.reviewText: Decent price for this multi pack of deodorant. I tried Ban because my usual go to Sure deodorant in powder fresh scent was unavailable. So doing a comparison between them, Ban doesn’t quite measure up. It is on the drier side applying it at first, after about a week it started going on smoother. For normal daily wear it does the job, but doesn’t hold up as well when you get really active.My biggest complaint is the sticky feel it gives me by the end of the day. It’s still working to control odor but definitely giving out in the antiperspirant department! It says 24 hour protection but definitely not in dryness!
